content.text:
# Baeksang Arts Award for Best Female Variety Performer

| awarded_for = Best female performance in South Korean variety programs
| country = South Korea
| presenter = Baeksang Arts Awards
| holder_label = Most recent winner
| holder =  (2025)
| website = [http://isplus.live.joins.com/100sang/ baeksangartsawards]
}}
The Baeksang Arts Award for Best Female Variety Performer () is annually presented at the Baeksang Arts Awards ceremony.
